TypeSignature.Value: .class public interface auto ansi abstract IGridItemProvider

summary.span: 公开一些方法和属性，UI 自动化客户端可通过这些方法和属性访问实现 的容器的各个子控件。

span.span: Exposes methods and properties to support UI Automation client access to individual child controls of containers that implement .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 控制实现通常可以遍历 （即，UI 自动化客户端可以移动到相邻控件） 通过使用键盘。Controls that implement can typically be traversed (that is, a UI Automation client can move to adjacent controls) by using the keyboard. 实现 UI 自动化提供程序必须支持上控件模式。Implemented on a UI Automation provider that must support the control pattern.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property Column As Integer
public: property int Column { int get(); };

summary.span: 获取包含单元格或项的列的序号。

span.span: Gets the ordinal number of the column that contains the cell or item.

value.span: 一个从零开始的序号，标识了包含该单元格或项的列。

span.span: A zero-based ordinal number that identifies the column containing the cell or item.

remarks.format: ## Examples 下面的代码示例返回的属性，它存储在一个内部变量。The following example code returns the property, which is stored in an internal variable. public: property int ColumnSpan { int get(); };

summary.span: 获取单元格或项跨的列数。

span.span: Gets the number of columns spanned by a cell or item.

remarks.format: ## Examples 下面的代码示例返回的项总是跨过单个列的网格中的项的属性。The following example code returns the property for an item in a grid whose items always span a single column.
